Topic.Title: Obama: We will get answers in Bombing Case!

Message.Msg: These three men have already given depositions. The transcripts of their depositions are public. The Secretary of Defense, the NATO commander, the State Department's Coordinator for Counterterrorism have already responded to issues raised in the depositions. What do you think is going to happen? You people are ridiculous. You have Froggie & Rush & Glen telling you that after Wednesday the President will have to resign. Why? Because a U.S. deputy chief thinks NATO should have scrambled some planes in Italy? The President will not resign on Wednesday because absolutely nothing will have changed since Tuesday. The ARB report detailed what it described as "systematic failures and leadership and management deficiencies" in the State Department, which Hilary Clinton has taken responsibility for. We know things went wrong in this incident.. But because some media hacks have you Tea Brains in a tizzy you're going to decide it's some big conspiracy that Obama isn't hanged for a traitor on Wed. evening. Nuts! Good Americans are working and pushing to ensure these failures do not happen again. But Congressman Issa and the rest of you Tea Brains are foaming at the mouth to try to pin something on Obama. Issa's selective "leaks" and "sneak previews" to Meet the Press and other media should show you that this hearing is all a media spectacle. A farce produced just for you gullible, old, ridiculous Tea Brains. And, tbfine, the parents of the victims have to endure this farce. And they will continue to have to endure it until you Tea Brains stop being so d***ed ridiculous.

Topic.Title: "What difference, at this point, does it make?"

Message.Msg: "The hunt is into which bureaucrats lied. . .in the second debate, told a whopper." Romney. Lie of the Year. Remember? If that is what you are concerned about, you are really mincing hairs. The evidence does show that intelligence reports linked it to violent protests at the embassy in Cairo at first blush. But you are really sticking your nose into a national security issue where it doesn't belong. Even if Obama himself and everyone around him knew it was a terrorist attack and portrayed it differently, you have no idea why. Were they protecting informants or undercover agents? Were they pursuing the attackers and did not want them to know they were on to them? Do you think, in an ongoing national security situation, you have a right to instantaneously know every detail of what happened? Even if releasing that information may put more lives at risk? It was not the only situation occurring at the time--there were violent protests and threats all over the Mideast, so denouncing that video may have been helpful regardless of its real link to the attack. This is the real world, wilkes. Not some kindergarten morality lesson. Obama wasn't starting a war or advocating a policy. He was dealing with a live, ongoing and complex situation in which American lives were in danger. You're upset he *may* have told a fib for a couple of days? You're in a Tea Brain hole. Climb out of it.

Topic.Title: "What difference, at this point, does it make?"

Message.Msg: Medical School Exam When I was young my intent was to go to medical school, but I was confused by the entrance exam. The deciding question was, "Re-arrange the letters P-N-E-S-I to spell out an important part of the human body that is more useful when erect." Those who spelled SPINE became doctors. The rest ran for Congress.
